snippet.title: Hidden Through Time | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Soon available for: Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox, Steam, Android and IOS.
Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/524910

Hidden Through Time is a cute game of hide and seek with objects scattered throughout the wonderful history of our world. Use cryptic hints to discover every secret as you explore the colourful hand drawn levels.
Discover, create and share worlds with your own hidden treasures in Hidden Through Time!
